## Description

This folder needs to contain the merged static library `libgta_sw_provider_merged.a` of __GTA API Software Provider__. The library can be downloaded as build artifact from the [GTA Software Provider](https://github.com/generic-trust-anchor-api/gta-api-sw-provider.git) project.
